actions.name: Fae Spirit

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Fairy-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Fairy-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is unaffected by its effects. Then, the user recovers 4 Ticks of HP.
